name: The 24 Hours in the Abyss
description:
The 24 Hours in the Abyss is a 2D survival-horror platformer takes place in a haunted rare ore mine in the 1920s. Jose, the miner as well as protagonist, encountered a mine accident with his fellows on a regular day. The way back to the ground was blocked and something evil is happening here. During the 24 hours before the rescue comes, Jose has to utilize everything he finds in the pit to find a way out, or, keep alive.

Screen reader support enabled.
